text.div:
NUBC Prescription Origin Code

UWhether the prescription was transmitted as an electronic prescription, by phone, by fax, or as a written paper copy.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http//www.ncpdp.org/prescription-origin-code

name: NUBCPrescriptionOriginCode
title: NUBC Prescription Origin Code
description: Whether the prescription was transmitted as an electronic prescription, by phone, by fax, or as a written paper copy.
